name: Save the Planet!!
description:
Your goal is to protect the Earth from harmful pollutants produced from factories. Click on factories to get rid of them. The more factories you have on Earth the quicker the ozone layer will deteriorate, so clear factories as fast as you can to delay the inevitable and save the planet while you still can!

Controls: 

   Left click: destroy factories

   Escape or P: pause

All art, code, music, and sound effects where made by me during the Jam period. The art was made in Adobe Illustrator, music and sfx where done in Ableton live (Which crashed and lost me 3 hours of progress right before submission - fun!), and code was done in Unity and Vscode.

Source code:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/13T-ExFgFPv6OD_J_sed_GVp4HAZHZYyp/view?usp=shari...

unfortunately the custom cursor is not working in the webGL build.
